block.p: BARTH-Peggy. On May 21, 2000. Beloved daughter of the late Grace and Joseph Barth; loving niece of the late Mae Houlihan; fond grandaughter of the late Mary and James Houlihan; dear sister of Eileen Barth. Reposing Redden Funeral Home, 325 West 14 St, NYC, Monday, 7-9 PM, and Tuesday and Wednesday 2-5 PM and 7-9 PM. Mass of Christian Burial Thursday, 10 AM, St. Bernard's R.C. Church. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery.
